name: Tanks 3D Go - Tanks Battle Avoid Other Tanks
name_original: Tanks 3D Go - Tanks Battle Avoid Other Tanks
description:
Remember the legendary classic tank war? Those nostalgic memories, along with us came the classic tank war, now well, on the phone will be able to play tank war, you can rampage, swept the enemy tanks.
Method of operation:
1. walk through the virtual joystick control
2. The left joystick controls the direction of the tank movement
3. Right joystick control tank muzzle direction
